sentences.en: a gin and tonic with ice and lemon
sentences.cn: 一杯加冰和柠檬的杜松子补酒

sentences.en: A good dose of tonic will help you to pick up.
sentences.cn: 一剂好的补品将有助于身体康复。

sentences.en: A lot of people need a tonic at the end of the winter.
He was knocking back his 10th gin and tonic of the day.
sentences.cn: 他正在大口喝着今天的第10杯加奎宁水的杜松子酒。

sentences.en: His generous offer was a tremendous tonic for our morale.
sentences.cn: 他的慷慨相助对我们的士气是种极大的激励。

sentences.en: I'll have a gin and tonic, please.
sentences.cn: 请来一杯加奎宁水的杜松子酒。

sentences.en: I'll just have a tonic water.
It will be marketed as a tonic for the elderly.
sentences.cn: 这将作为老年人滋补品在市场上销售.

sentences.en: Keeler sipped at his gin and tonic.
sentences.cn: 基勒小口抿着他加了奎宁水的杜松子酒。

sentences.en: Sea air is Nature's best tonic for mind and body.
sentences.cn: 海上的空气是大自然赋予的对人们身心的最佳补品.

sentences.en: Seeing Marcus at that moment was a great tonic.
sentences.cn: 在那一刻见到马库斯是非常令人兴奋的事。

sentences.en: She carried on serenely sipping her gin and tonic.
sentences.cn: 她继续安静地小口抿着加奎宁水的杜松子酒。

sentences.en: She ordered a large vodka and tonic from a passing waiter.
sentences.cn: 她向经过她身旁的服务员要了一大杯加了奎宁水的伏特加酒.

sentences.en: The salesman proclaimed that his tonic would cure all diseases.
sentences.cn: 推销员宣称他的滋补品将治愈所有的病.

sentences.en: This tonic will work miracles for your depression.
sentences.cn: 这种补药对治疗你的忧郁症十分有效.

words.tran_cn: 年久变色的；有声调的，具有……音质的
沉闷的；单调的；缺乏声调的；无声的
强壮；肌肉弹性；紧张性；调位强度
滋补的；声调的；使精神振作的

phrases.tran_cn: 琴酒补剂；杜松子酒补剂

trans.tran_cn: 滋补品，奎宁水，<音>主音，<语>浊音
trans.tran_en: a drink that you have as a medicine to give you more energy or strength when you feel tired

trans.tran_cn: 滋补品，补药；强身的，健体的
trans.tran_en: a drink that you have as a medicine to give you more energy or strength when you feel tired
